parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row of the cell

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column of the cell

title: ITableAnnotation.UnmergeCells
description: Splits the specified previously merged cell in this table.
signature:
System.Boolean UnmergeCells( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row of the cell

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column of the cell

returns: True if the cell splits successfully, false if not
remarks: Index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
